revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nexxt Solutions |model=Nebula 150 |revision=(ARN01154U1) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/12/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tenda |manuf_model=W311R |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=X4Y311,V7TW311R |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.2 |pwr_barrel_inner=3 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050;RT3050F, P2M0720S0, 1016ST; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050;RT3050F, P2M0720S0, 1016ST; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Nexxt |default_ssid_regex=^Nexxt$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=C8:3A:35 |oui_eth=C8:3A:35 }} {{TagLine|150Mbps 4-Port 10/100 Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.nexxtsolutions.com/dpg/ntProducts.aspx?ctg=12&sctg=67 Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://support.nexxtsolutions.com/customer/portal/articles/2328192-nebula-150-firmware-upgrade Support page]
"N01204PN111A1" is silkscreened on the bottom of the main board.
The device seems to be some revision of the [[Tenda W311R v2]]. :The RAM and Flash [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=64016 seems to differ from (at least some) W311R v2s].
Part numbers for the router include... *ARN01154U1 (110/220V) *ARN01154U2 *ARN01152A1 (220V Arg) *ARN01151U1 (110V)
The power adapter included with the router is a :'''Shenzhen Heweishun Network Technology''' TEA09-09100 (9V, 1.0A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
==Images== <gallery> File:Nexxt_Nebula_150_board_top.jpg|board top File:Nexxt_Nebula_150_board_bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
